title: Looking for Clash Team/Create one
body:
Hey all, im creating a clash team for tonight, Need 1 more player! looking for Tiers 4 -2 around silver/gold preferably, if not it dosnt matter! 

(Just a heads up one team member fills any role)

ADC (Taken)
SUP (Taken)
MID (Taken) 
Jungle (Taken)
TOP (OPEN)

{{sticker:sg-kiko}}

replies.body: Silver Support Yuumi one trick IGN Pls Ban Jax Discord Dodo#5291
Hey! sorry, we have a support and got one instantly as I posted this, but we are still are looking for a top laner!
